casebody.data:
Manuel Ortiz GARCIA, Appellant, v. Joseph W. SANFORD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 9695. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. May 28, 1941. Manuel Ortiz Garcia, in propria persona, for appellant. Lawrence S. Camp, U. S. Atty. and Harvey H. Tysinger and John J. Flynt, Jr., Asst. U. S. Attys., all of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before FOSTER, HUTCHESON, and -HOLMES, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
